text: Jerzy Mikułowski Pomorski (3 January 1937 – 12 December 2020) was a Polish sociologist and professor. He was a doctor honoris causa of Grand Valley State University (1993) and Teesside University (1995). He was a rector of Cracow University of Economics in years 1990–1996. Pomorski died on 12 December 2020 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish writers Category:Polish sociologists
title: Jerzy Mikułowski Pomorski
